WAYNE STATE UNIVERSITY
RADIO AND TELEVISION
DETROIT 2. MICHIGAN
July 5, 1960
■■
Dr. Harry J. Skornia
President
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
In reference to your letter of June 24 concerning
the Resolutions Comnittee, I accept*
I*m going on vacation for 30 days. Bye for now.
Sincerely yours,
Dr. Lee s. Dreyfus
Assistant Director
Radio and Television
